mapper.select: SELECT notice_key, notice_title, notice_content, date_format(notice_date, '%Y.%m.%d') AS noticeDate, notice_hits FROM notice WHERE notice_key = #{noticeKey}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (notice_title, notice_content, notice_date, admin_key) SELECT #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, NOW(), (SELECT admin_key FROM admin WHERE admin_id = #{adminId})
